amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 116-457 to establish a policy framework for the accelerated withdrawal of U.S. forces from Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to establish a policy framework for the accelerated withdrawal of U.S. forces from Afghanistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Omar amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 129 - 284 (Roll no. 144).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Omar.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Omar amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 129 - 284 (Roll no. 144).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Omar amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 129 - 284 (Roll no. 144).
